prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (powerful African-American boxer:1.2), muscular physique, aggressive determined expression, realistic sweat on skin, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: visible skin pores, prominent veins, (matching macro leather texture on boxing gloves:1.2), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching silk fabric folds on robe:1.2), sharp focus, subsurface scattering, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, thin build, friendly smile, elegant, low quality, blurry face, (deformed gloves:1.3), soft lighting, clean skin, (doll:1.2)
